protein.general_function: Involved in G-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
protein.specific_function: Receptor for extracellular ATP > UTP and ADP. The activity of this receptor is mediated by G proteins which activate a phosphatidylinositol-calcium second messenger system. May be the cardiac P2Y receptor involved in the regulation of cardiac muscle contraction through modulation of L-type calcium currents. Is a receptor for leukotriene B4, a potent chemoattractant involved in inflammation and immune response

go_class.description: cell surface receptor linked signaling pathway
g-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
